This torrent works perfectly.
I don't speak polish but i managed to install it.
To install hoi2 doomsday - armageddon you have to install doomsday first and then armageddon, and then the patches.
1. unzip
2. open - Program SkrĂÂłtowy Hearts of Iron 2
3. press zainstaluj Hoi: 2 Doomsday (install hoi: 2 Doomsday) and install
4. press aninstaluj hoi: 2 Doomsday - Armageddon and install
5. press Patche do hoi: 2 doomsday i Armageddon to install patches 1.1 and 1.2

Thanks for the upload.
